EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Dear Mat, It was a pleasure speaking with you today. I’ve enclosed a few resources that you might find helpful: - Here is a short list of some of our top clients within MBO Access <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Access_Information.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs0tW6e6WLaL%2BnDrOaY2kr7VzDrrq3sxw2kdzGIalUg%3D%3D>. - Here is the link to Contract Best Practices <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/2013-MBO-Contracts-Best_Practices.pdf> - We have an index of recorded Webinars that will comprehensively cover everything to do with working independently. You can see them by going here. <http://www.mbopartners.com/resources/all> - You can review our “Independent’s Guide” by going here. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs0tW6e6WLaL%2BnDrOaY2kr7VzDrrq3sxw2kdzGIalUg%3D%3D> - You can join MBO’s LinkedIn in group by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.linkedin.com/groups?gid=71161&mostPopular=&trk=tyah&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs0tW6e6WLaL%2BnDrOaY2kr7VzDrrq3sxw2kdzGIalUg%3D%3D>. - Lastly, you can view all the information we spoke about over the phone by going here. <http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-m-moul.html> (Please bookmark this page.) I will follow up with you, if you have questions before then, feel free to schedule a convenient time for you using my online schedule by going here. <https://my.timedriver.com/Y3NJC> Best,Meghan ___________________Meghan MoulConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6359f: 703.793.6473e: mmoul@mbopartners.com <mailto:mmoul@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=moul> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. From: Meghan Moul Sent: Monday, December 09, 2013 12:02 PM To: 'handmr@gmail.com' Subject: MBO Partners- Call confirmation Hi Mat, Thank you for your inquiry. I noticed you had questions in regards to value-based method of choosing a rate. I wanted to pass along some information that might be helpful to review before our call. Below is information on the value based method of bill rate calculation:http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide/succeed/value-based-bill-rate-calculation <http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide/succeed/value-based-bill-rate-calculation> Here is some more information on figuring out how much you can charge:http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide/plan/how-much-should-i-charge <http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide/plan/how-much-should-i-charge> Also, MBO did a webinar on how to calculate your bill rate:http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ONZ-9dYVV_8 <http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ONZ-9dYVV_8> If you would like to review these and need more time, we can certainly reschedule the call. Please let me know what works best for you. Thank you! ___________________Meghan MoulConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6359f: 703.793.6473e: mmoul@mbopartners.com <mailto:mmoul@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
